name: Security Breach Beat Mod
description:
When you like to dance and at the same time you like horror games, you get it all in one! You can make your character move slow and fast as you can control the game as you want so lets make him happy not sad by making the best dance moves and enjoy the world of music and dances...

If you are happy with our game simply share with your friends and help us to be the best because we are a community, thank you.
